column4: Why don't Banshee or Rhythmbox close when I tell them to close?  Ctrl-W?  The X in the corner?  Right-click and Quit from the Unity bar?  I need the music to STOP PLAYING.
stop music and close it or use Control+q
The Pause button is NOT closing the program.
Ctrl-Q has no response to the program.  I don't know why.
